item.title: CVE-2021-21488|2024-08-03T18:16:22.566Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20netweaver%20knowledge%20management
item.description: Knowledge Management versions 7.01, 7.02, 7.30, 7.31, 7.40, 7.50 allows a remote attacker with basic privileges to deserialize user-controlled data without verification, leading to insecure deserialization which triggers the attackerâ€™s code, therefore impacting Availability.
